channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for GA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for GA

item.title: Report X-2024040426
item.description:
Report X-2024040426

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-17T15:16:09+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-31
  • City: ELLENWOOD
  • State: GA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Box was discovered inside an overhead chute, it was put into a hazardous material salvage drum and taken to be processed. Ftrack states it came down the chute the day before so it is not clear how the package was actually leaking. DescribePack: The lid is dented either fro being dropped or from being sorted incorrectly as an overhead package but that is where the drum is leaking from. DurationRel: 19 and MitigateEffect: it was put into a hazardous material salvage drum and taken to be processed

item.title: Report X-2024040724
item.description:
Report X-2024040724

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-16T18:13:46+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-13
  • City: CONLEY
  • State: GA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: ABF FREIGHT SYSTEM, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: DAVID RATH, 086 OPERATION SUPERVISOR, ADVISED SAFETY OF A HYDROGEN PEROXIDE SPILL ON THE DOCK AT BAY 87. DAVID STATED IT HAS BEEN PUNCTURED BY A FORKLIFT OPERATOR WHILE LOADING THE FREIGHT. DAVID IS UNAWARE WHICH FORK LIFT OPERATOR PUNCTURED THE FREIGHT AND AT THE MOMENT NOT ABLE TO REVIEW CAMERA FO OTAGE. CURA HAS BEEN CALLED FOR REMEDIATION.
